attributes.action: Re-classify paedophilia as a psychological illness and lock-up paedophiles until they are cured.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Paedophiles with a predilection for prepubescent sex should be locked up until they are cured, in order to protect the human rights of children. Paedophiles may agree to castration (or other methods), as a cure, or remain secured. Appropriately qualified doctors should approve the effectiveness of a cure.
Other crimes committed at the same time as the paedophile offence may be prosecuted separately.
